path: Boxes/Temple College Nursing Program/LVN Program/Fall 24/Pharmacology/Documents/Module VI/FA2024 Pharmacology (VNSG-1331-1001) LEC/Pharmacology Objectives Module 6 GI & Urinary.pdf
text: TEMPLE COLLEGE SCHOOL OF VOCATIONAL NURSING VNSG 1331: PHARMACOLOGY Objectives Module 6 Drugs that affect the Gastrointestinal and Urinary Systems Chapters 40, 41, 33, & 48 1. Discuss the actions, uses, adverse reactions, contraindications, precautions, and interactions of drugs that affect the gastrointestinal and urinary systems. 2. Implement important pre-administration and ongoing focused assessment activities the nurse should perform on a patient taking a drug that affects the gastrointestinal and urinary systems. 3. Use the nursing process to implement care for a patient receiving a drug that affects the gastrointestinal and urinary systems 4. Identify important points to keep in mind when educating patients and families about the use of the drugs covered in this module.
